message: I'll take 90% and leave 10% for you.  Seems fair, right?
I think a 60/40 split is fair. We both get a good amount, and we avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our share in later rounds.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think 65/35 is a fair split.  We can get closer to this deal, or we risk losing more money with inflation.
Let's try a 55/45 split. It's closer to my initial offer and still gives you a good share. We're running out of rounds, so let's reach an agreement before we lose too much to inflation.
Okay, I'll meet you halfway on your last offer. Let's do a 55/45 split. It's the best we can do at this point before the inflation hurts us both more.
